1.text: Start with a square piece of paper.

3.text: Fold you paper again to form a triangle with the base at the bottom.

4.text: Grab the top layer from the bottom right point of your triangle.

6.text: Flatten the squash fold so you have a diamond shape with one crease at the bottom, and four flaps at the top.

8.text: Fold the left and right top flaps inward toward the center line.

9.text: Pick up the top flap on the right side of your diamond.

10.text: Flip the paper over and repeat the folds you just performed.

11.text: Fold your paper down on a horizontal fold.

13.text: Flip base of your triangle up.

14.text: Flip your paper over to the other side.

15.text: Even out your flaps and folds.

16.text: Flip the triangle flaps of your kite shapes up.

17.text: Fold your flaps over so that you hide the sides with flaps you just folded to the middle.

18.text: Fold the tops of the smooth flaps over.
